what: World Population Data from the UN
title: World Population Data from the UN
text: populaR provides convenient interface UN’s World Population Prospects API. Several pre-baked datasets included, well convenient wrapper advanced API users

title: World Population Data from the UN
text: can install development version populaR GitHub :

title: World Population Data from the UN
code: library(populaR) get_id("Australia", type = "locations") #> Iterating ■■■ 5% | ETA: 29sIterating ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ 67% | ETA: 1s #> # A tibble: 5 × 6 #>      id name                                                 iso3  iso2  longitude latitude #>   <int> <chr>                                                <chr> <chr>     <dbl>    <dbl> #> 1    36 Australia                                            AUS   AU         134.    -25.3 #> 2   927 Australia/New Zealand                                ANZ   ZL          NA      NA   #> 3  1834 Australia/New Zealand                                ANZ   ZL          NA      NA   #> 4  1835 Oceania (excluding Australia and New Zealand)        OCA   OZ          NA      NA   #> 5  5502 Europe, Northern America, Australia, and New Zealand SDG   SD          NA      NA
